doc.summary: Gets the login packet index from the packet.
doc.text: Gets the login packet index from the packet.

doc.summary: Sets the login packet index to the packet.
doc.text: Sets the login packet index to the packet.

doc.summary: Builds a list of login packets that are sent on login.
doc.text: Builds a list of login packets that are sent on login. The default implementation calls a public no-arg constructor on the message class and returns a List with exactly one packet.

doc.summary: Gets whether this login packet needs a response.
doc.text: Gets whether this login packet needs a response. The default implementation returns true.

doc.summary: An interface that extends the logic in <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/network/PacketSerializer">PacketSerializer</ref> to support login packets.
doc.text: An interface that extends the logic in <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/network/PacketSerializer">PacketSerializer</ref> to support login packets.
